member.name: D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_FLAGS
member.summary: Defines constants that specify the flags for a parameter to a meta command. Values can be bitwise OR'd together.

member.name: D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_FLAGS.D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_FLAG_INPUT
member.summary: Specifies that the parameter is an input resource.

member.name: D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_FLAGS.D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_FLAG_OUTPUT
member.summary: Specifies that the parameter is an output resource.
